# exit

**Type Property**

The exit of the run loop, after exiting the event processing loop. This activity occurs once for each call to [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopRun()] and [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopRunInMode(_:_:_:)].

## Declaration

```swift
static var exit: CFRunLoopActivity { get }
```

## Constants

- **entry**: The entrance of the run loop, before entering the event processing loop. This activity occurs once for each call to [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopRun()] and [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopRunInMode(_:_:_:)].
- **beforeTimers**: Inside the event processing loop before any timers are processed.
- **beforeSources**: Inside the event processing loop before any sources are processed.
- **beforeWaiting**
- **afterWaiting**: Inside the event processing loop after the run loop wakes up, but before processing the event that woke it up. This activity occurs only if the run loop did in fact go to sleep during the current loop.
- **allActivities**: A combination of all the preceding stages.
